description:
Welcome to the marvelous Super Hero Fight Club:

- 17 fabulous fighters and their superpowers
- Quick tactical combats
- Tricky modes, levels and powerups
- Up to 4 players rumble
- Single player challenges

Become the Queen or King of the Fight Club!
name: Super Hero Fight Club: Reloaded
intro: Get into legendary superhero battles in this action-brawler for up to 4 players!
